name: Appodeal Text File
summary: Learn about .APPODEAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Appodeal is an in-app advertising platform that Android developers can use to monetize their applications. To do so, developers use Appodeal's software development kit (SDK) to add calls to Appodeal's advertising network to their apps.

Apps that show Appodeal advertisements create an APPODEAL file that is stored in Android devices' Internal Shared Storage folder. While the file's exact purpose is unknown, it always contains the text e30=. Most likely, apps that make calls to the Appodeal advertising network reference this file to determine whether or not they should show ads.

instructions: APPODEAL files are not meant to be opened. However, because APPODEAL files are plain text files, you can open them in any text editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
